bibl.title: Letter from Lloyd D. LeMan to Philip Showalter Hench, January 3, 1942

div1.p: LeMan informs Hench that he is welcome to inspect the files of the War Department Signal Officer.

div1.head: Letter from Lloyd D. LeMan to Philip Showalter Hench, January 3, 1942
div1.opener:
IN REPLY
REFER TO
OCSig0 004.511
(1-3-42)
WAR DEPARTMENT
OFFICE OF THE CHIEF SIGNAL OFFICER
WASHINGTON
January 3, 1942.
0-2-S
Dr. Philip S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minnesota.
Dear Sir:
div1.p:
Replying to your letter of December 30th, the Chief
Signal Officer directs me to advise that you are welcomed to
inspect our files on your visit in Washington.
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, Lloyd D. LeMan,
Major, Signal Corps. MentionsBldg.
Mrs Maria Maxwel
